casebody.data:
Keith POOLER, Appellant,
v.
STATE of New York, Respondent. Court of Appeals of New York. August 29, 2019

Appeal transferred without costs, by the Courtsua sponte, to the Appellate Division, Third Department, upon the ground that a direct appeal does not lie when questions other than the constitutional validity of a statutory provision are involved (see NY Const, art VI, § § 3 [b][2], 5 [b]; CPLR 5601[b][2] ).
